title: Users want to see a CSP summary (Pre 10/3/04)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE

(Players who signed on or before 10/3/2004:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp_legacy_-_before_10_3_2004

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CSP+Summary )
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to advanced search through the magnifying glass link at the top
AND selects Minor Contract in the Search For drop down
AND selects Signing Date / Before for the filter
AND enters in 10/3/2004
AND clicks the add filter link to add another row
AND selects Addendum B Clause / is for the next filter
AND selects College Scholarship
AND clicks Search button
AND clicks on a player
AND navigates to their CSP summary

e.g. https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/csp?playerId=138681
custom_expected:
THEN the summary section will have a Comitted, Used and Remaining section 
AND these sections will NOT have Living Allowance and Tuition subsections

title: Users want to see a CSP summary (10/3/04 - 1/12/05)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE

(Players who signed after 10/3/2004 and before 1/12/2005:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp)



Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CSP+Summary)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to advanced search through the magnifying glass link at the top
AND selects Minor Contract in the Search For drop down
AND selects Signing Date / Between for the filter
AND enters in 10/3/2004 and 1/12/2005
AND clicks the add filter link to add another row
AND selects Addendum B Clause / is for the next filter
AND selects College Scholarship
AND clicks Search button
AND clicks on a player
AND navigates to their CSP summary
AND verifies that there is at least one invoice in his payment history
AND verifies that it is listed as â€œPaidâ€￾
AND clicks Edit
AND switches the Status field of that invoice to â€œOpenâ€￾
And clicks Save
And clicks Edit again
AND switches the previously changed field back to â€œPaidâ€￾

e.g https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/csp?playerId=304466
custom_expected:
THEN the summary section will have a Comitted, Used and Remaining section
AND each section will have a Living Allowance and Tuition subsection
AND the Payment History table has a Total column

title: Users want to see a CSP summary (Post 1/12/05)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE

(Players who signed after 1/12/2005:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CSP+Summary)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to advanced search through the magnifying glass link at the top
AND selects Minor Contract in the Search For drop down
AND selects Signing Date / After for the filter
AND enters in 1/12/2005
AND clicks the add filter link to add another row
AND selects Addendum B Clause / is for the next filter
AND selects College Scholarship
AND clicks Search button
AND clicks on a player
AND navigates to their CSP summary

e.g. https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/csp?playerId=371783
custom_expected:
THEN the summary section will have a Comitted, Used and Remaining section
AND each section will have a Living Allowance and Tuition subsection
AND the payment History Table has a Gross and Net column

title: Users want to see a CEP summary
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks CSP/CEP on the left nav bar and is taken to the CSP/CEP widget
AND finds players with Type = CEP
AND finds a CEP player with a "Used" amount greater than 0 for either living or tuition allowance
AND clicks the player's name to be taken to their CEP summary
AND verifies that the player has an Invoice in their payment history with status = Paid
AND clicks Edit
AND switches the Status field of that invoice to â€œOpenâ€￾
And clicks Save
And clicks Edit again
AND switches the previously changed field back to â€œPaidâ€￾
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a Remaining section
AND this section will have two subsections, Tuition Allowance and Living Allowance
AND each subsection will only have one field labeled "Balance"

title: User can search for an existing invoice
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in test_boc_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the magnifying glass at the top of the page
AND user is on the Advanced Search page and CSP/CEP Invoice is an option in the Search For dropdown
AND user specifies a CSP/CEP Invoice Status is Open (Canceled, Open, Paid) and clicks Search
custom_expected:
Conducting an advanced search will return the following columns by default

Player Name
Responsible Org
Payee
Created
Total Amount
Status

title: User navigates to widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks CSP/CEP on the left nav bar
custom_expected: THEN the CSP/CEP widget will load with the title "Current CSP/CEP"

title: User can find an appropriate player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as logged in as test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE
AND user is viewing the CSP/CEP widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user looks at all players that have type = CSP
AND Signing Date < 10/3/04
AND user finds a player that has a Status of Current or Current, Tuition Allowance only
custom_expected: THEN the user can click on the player's name and be taken to their CSP summary

title: User can create a new invoice (pre 04)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has completed [C1213447](http://testrail.mlb.us-east-1.bamgrid.net/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/1213447&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=145847)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks New Invoice
custom_expected: THEN user is taken to a new invoice form

title: User can save a new invoice
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has completed [C1213402](http://testrail.mlb.us-east-1.bamgrid.net/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/1213402)
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in [current year] for Year
AND 6 for Credits
AND Spring for Period
AND Semester for Semester
AND selects A.T. Still University of Health Sciences from School dropdown
AND fills in $1 for Tuition
AND clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN a blue notification will appear that reads "Invoice saved successfully"

title: User can mark invoice as Paid
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE
AND has completed C1213685
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the CSP summary tab of the player's profile
AND clicks Edit
AND changes the status of the Invoice created in C1213685 to Paid
AND fills in today's date for Date and Payment Mailed
AND fills in some number for Check #
AND clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN there will be a blue success notification that states "CSP summary saved succesfully

title: User can create a new credit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE
AND navigates to https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/csp?playerId=51542
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks New Credit
custom_expected: THEN a new form opens with the Title "Credit"

title: User can save a new credit and see CSP status change
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE
AND has completed 
AND is looking at a new Credit [C1213457](http://testrail.mlb.us-east-1.bamgrid.net/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/1213457&group_by=cases:section_id&group_id=145853&group_order=asc)
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects "Current, Living Allowance Only" in the Status Dropdown
AND blanks out the "Living Allowance" Field
AND user fills in 1997 for Year
AND Fall for Period
AND Semester for Semester/Quarter
AND 0 for Credits
custom_expected:
THEN the user sees a blue notification that reads "Credit saved successfully"
AND the user sees a blue notification that reads "The CSP has been changed to Completed"
AND the Date Completed field now shows today's date

title: CSP Calc is performed on credit deletion
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE
AND has completed [C1213462](http://testrail.mlb.us-east-1.bamgrid.net/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/1213462)
AND is viewing the newly saved credit
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks Delete
AND clicks Yes on the "Are you sure you want to delete" message
custom_expected: THEN the user receives a blocker message that reads: "You cannot enter an Invoice or Credit for a Closed or Lapsed CSP/CEP. Please update the status to a current state."

title: User can delete a credit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE
AND user has completed [C1213463](http://testrail.mlb.us-east-1.bamgrid.net/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/1213463)
AND user is viewing the blocker message created at the end of the test
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks Back on the blocker message
AND clicks Edit
AND changes the Status dropdown to "Completed, Living Allowance Only"
AND user clicks Delete
AND clicks Yes on the "Are you sure you want to delete" message
custom_expected:
THEN the user sees a blue success notification that reads "CSP Credit has been deleted"
AND the user is returned to the player's CSP summary

title: User can save a new credit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE
AND has completed [C1213646](http://testrail.mlb.us-east-1.bamgrid.net/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/1213646&group_by=cases:section_id&group_id=145852&group_order=asc)
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in 2017 for Year
AND selects 2 Year/4 year from the School Type dropdown
AND selects Fall for Period
AND enters in 10,000 for Tuition
AND clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN the user sees a blue notification that reads "Credit saved successfully"

title: User can delete a credit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE
AND has completed [C1213647](http://testrail.mlb.us-east-1.bamgrid.net/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/1213647)
AND is viewing the newly saved credit
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks Delete
AND clicks Yes on the "Are you sure you want to delete" message
custom_expected: THEN the the credit is deleted and the user sees a blue success notification that reads "CEP credit has been deleted"

title: As a user I want to be see CSP schools
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as test_boc_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
custom_steps:
WHEN user hovers over CSP/CEP in the left nav bar
AND waits for the submenu to pop out
AND clicks on Schools in the submenu
custom_expected: THEN a widget loads with the title "CSP/CEP Schools"

title: As a user I want to be able to view an existing CSP school profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as test_boc_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
AND user has completed [C1213384](http://testrail.mlb.us-east-1.bamgrid.net/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/1213384&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=145841)


Wireframe: 

http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp_school_profile
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a school from the list
custom_expected:
THEN a school profile will open with an Edit Delete and Close button
AND School Information and Address sections

title: As a user I want to create a new CEP school
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as test_boc_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
AND user is viewing the CSP schools widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks
AND fills in Name
AND selects "Vocational School" from the Type dropdown
AND selects CEP from Approved For dropdown
AND fills in an Address Line 1
AND selects USA for the Country dropdown
custom_expected: THEN a successful blue save notification will display.
